name: BRIGHTEST
description: A simple entertainment game where we stay away from the enemies and find the necessary supplies and get rid of them.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: Any processor, 32-bit available Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Any 1 GB moderate display card DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 900 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX Supported Additional Notes: It has not been tested on any device, it does not mean it can work on any system!
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: Any processor, 32-bit available Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Any 2 GB moderate video card DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1800 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX Supported Additional Notes: It has not been tested on any device, it does not mean it can work on any system!
